title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 301.4 - Care of war veterans and members of their families in public homes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 301.4 - Care of war veterans and members of their families in public homes

State Regulations

War veterans and adult members of their families, who
would be eligible for veteran assistance, may (with their consent) be cared for
in public homes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
301.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
